widget.convert: {"templates": {"default": (40, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (35, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (40, 0), size = (60, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (110, 0), size = (250, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (420, 0), size = (300, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (730, 0), size = (200, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], True, "showNever"), "notselected": (40, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (35, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (40, 0), size = (60, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (110, 0), size = (250, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (420, 0), size = (300, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (730, 0), size = (200, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], False, "showNever") }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 30), gFont("Regular", 28)], "itemHeight": 40 }

screen.name: DialogScreen
screen.title: DialogScreen
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 80, textsize[1] + 80) offset = 90 wsizex = textsize[0] + 120 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (600 > wsizex): wsizex = 600 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 20, 80) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, (720-wsizey)/2))

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code,but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize,ePoint
orgwidth=self.instance.size().width() orgpos=self.instance.position() textsize=self["text" ].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize=(textsize[0 ] + 80,textsize[1 ] + 80) offset=20 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset=90 wsizex=textsize[0 ] + 120 wsizey=textsize[1 ] + offset if (600 > wsizex): wsizex=600 wsize=(wsizex,wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text" ].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize=(wsizex - 20,80) self["list" ].instance.move(ePoint(10,textsize[1 ])) self["list" ].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth=wsize[0 ] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2,orgpos.y()))
